title: champ select animation lag
body:
yall hi ok listen
so today for some reason i was having terrible amounts of trouble in champ select with the animations smoothly loading to my laptop, and when they did they would load way late. Nearly missed a ban, and as i was telling my team something quick, the typing took forever to load on to the screen and send, which caused me to miss my pick and it kicked me out of champ select :))))))))))))) i dont suspect its anything wrong with my laptop because i can type this just fine, and my laptop is hardwired with nothing else connected to the wifi or being used. idk where to post this. help?

replies.body:
It sounds like your entire client is freezing up in little bursts. This is especially frustrating when it starts affecting things like missing a ban or kicking you out the game entirely! Let's start by using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to grab some logs. 

Send those logs to our tech specialists in a ticket, and we'll be able to provide more context on what's going on.

THERE HAS BEEN A DEVELOPMENT IN THE CASE YALL
ok so like 
i made it in to a game
and my loading screen sat there
and then 
it loads me in to game finally
just to tell me that my team remade because the game wouldnt load me in
im so done smh.
